home.parrafo-info: I build innovative technological solutions that enhance growth and competitiveness.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am passionate about technological development and innovation. I stand out for being dedicated, responsible and honest, always giving my best effort in each project. My adaptability allows me to take on challenges with confidence, working both in a team and independently to ensure quality results.

I have experience in software development, resource optimization and project management under the Scrum framework. In addition, I have led teams to implement technological solutions that improve the competitiveness and productivity of companies, always with a high sense of social responsibility.

I am motivated by continuous learning and professional growth, always looking for new ways to improve and contribute to the success of the projects in which I participate.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: Development of an e-commerce application in JavaScript that allows users to browse a variety of luxury yachts and make online purchases.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: Software developed in Python that provides an integral solution designed for the efficient management of time and payroll in companies.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: Database to manage various aspects of the farm, such as production, inventory of products and inputs, employee management, sales and purchases.
